full_summary:
**Multiple Victoria Class Spares - UMM PIN**

**Reference:** [cb-6306-21315497](#)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional

**Solicitation Number:** W8482-241748/A

**Publication Date:** June 15, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** July 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Expected Contract Start Date:** August 21, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024

**Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)

**UNSPSC Codes:** *25111900 - Marine craft systems and subassemblies
*44122106 - Pins or tacks

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide

**Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia, British Columbia

**Contracting Entity:** National Defence Canada
Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
Contact: Cassandra Leach, [Cassandra.Leach@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Cassandra.Leach) (999) 999-9999

**Notice URL:** None

**Attachments:** [Download the RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6306/w8482-241748a---rfp_0.pdf) and [Annex A](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6306/w8482-241748a---annex-a.xls)

**Tender Description:**

The Department of National Defence seeks to acquire several marine craft systems and subassemblies, specifically the following items:

* 3 units of item 001, Part No. 7225886, NCAGE A0461, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.
* 3 units of item 002, Part No. 7225886, NCAGE A0461, to be delivered to CFB Halifax.

Bidders are required to propose an equivalent or substitute product, including the brand name and model, or part number, and NCAGE. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Note: This is a rewritten text in a more professional format, condensed from the original 800 words to 400 words or less.
